disclaimer.title: Food Recall Disclaimer
disclaimer.body:
This application provides food recall information for products sold in the United States for informational purposes only.

The information displayed in this app is based on publicly available data from government agencies (including but not limited to the FDA and USDA) and other third-party sources. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided.

This app does not replace official recall notifications, manufacturer communications, or guidance from regulatory authorities. Users are encouraged to verify recall information directly with official sources.

A product not identified as recalled in this app does not guarantee that the product is safe or not subject to a current or future recall.

This app does not provide medical, nutritional, or health advice. If you have concerns about food safety, contamination, allergies, or illness, consult a qualified healthcare professional or follow official guidance from public health authorities.

This app does not verify expiration dates or product freshness.

Barcode scanning, lot number recognition, and voice or visual outputs may be subject to technical limitations or errors. Users remain responsible for verifying product details and recall status.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, the developer shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages, injuries, or losses arising from the use or reliance on the information provided by this app.

Recall coverage is limited to food products sold in the United States and may not apply to products sold in other countries.
